room_title: Escape room "Patient Zero" by Fort Wayne Escape Room in Fort Wayne
room_address: 327 E Wayne St #200 Fort Wayne, IN 46802
room_description:
It's been a year since the first breakout of the virus, and you are the few lucky ones who are still not infected. The last thing you can remember is going on a supply run with the rest of your group. Then you awake locked in an unknown chamber with a bump on your head...
After looking through the room you realize that at least you’re not alone, most of your group is still alive and locked with you. Who captured you? Are the rest of your friends still alive? Has your group been exposed to the virus? So many questions… but only one way out!
